source: TEXT_BANVAN008_02225_SEQ_00<tab>Linu Vali smiles at you warmly, and it looks like she has something to say.
target: TEXT_BANVAN008_02225_SEQ_00<tab>ナッキ島のリヌバリは、冒険者に伝えたいことがあるようだ。

source: TEXT_BANVAN008_02225_SEQ_01<tab>Linu Vali once again expresses her gratitude for everything you have done for her tribe. Her brother also wishes to express his thanks, and looks deep in thought. Speak with him to hear what words his meditative mood has brought to him.
target: TEXT_BANVAN008_02225_SEQ_01<tab>リヌバリから、冒険者の働きを感謝された。長老リヌバヌからも、感謝の言葉があるらしい。ナッキ島の「群雲のリヌバヌ」と話そう。

source: TEXT_BANVAN008_02225_SEQ_02<tab>You speak with Linu Vanu, and despite his initial difficulties in figuring out what to say, he finally finds words that adequately express his gratitude. He names you an honored guest of the Gundu, and says you will be welcome with open arms whenever you wish to visit Ok' Gundu Nakki.
target: TEXT_BANVAN008_02225_SEQ_02<tab>リヌバヌと話した。彼から感謝の言葉を受け、冒険者はグンド族の「鮮やかな友」として迎えられた。

source: TEXT_BANVAN008_02225_LINUVALI_000_000<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, Ok' Gundu Nakki thrives more than ever. To think about the hardships <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> helps us through...
target:
TEXT_BANVAN008_02225_LINUVALI_000_000まぁ、)) (( )) 02 /var>さん。
いつも、いつも、ありがとうございます。
たくさん、働いてくれたこと…………。

source: TEXT_BANVAN008_02225_LINUVALI_000_001<tab>Linu Vali knows words are wind, but she thanks you with all her heart! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> is as sibling born in same nest!
target: TEXT_BANVAN008_02225_LINUVALI_000_001<tab>喩えようもないくらい、感謝しています！！

source: TEXT_BANVAN008_02225_LINUVALI_000_002<tab>Linu Vanu wishes to express thanks to <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> as well. Go to him, he is eager to share his words.
target:
TEXT_BANVAN008_02225_LINUVALI_000_002私たちの長老リヌバヌも、
改めて、貴方に感謝の言葉を伝えたいようです。
どうか、「群雲のリヌバヌ」に声をかけてください。

source: TEXT_BANVAN008_02225_LINUVALI_000_005<tab>Linu Vanu wishes to thank <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> for guiding Gundu safely through the storm. Go to him, he is eager to speak with you!
target:
TEXT_BANVAN008_02225_LINUVALI_000_005私たちの長老リヌバヌも、
改めて、貴方に感謝の言葉を伝えたいようです。
どうか、「群雲のリヌバヌ」に声をかけてください。

source: TEXT_BANVAN008_02225_LINUVANU_000_010<tab>Ah, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, it brings Linu Vanu joy to see you again. For moons does Linu Vanu seek metaphor to express thanks for netherling's actions...
target:
TEXT_BANVAN008_02225_LINUVANU_000_010おお、)) (( )) 02 /var>よ。
ずっと、ずっと、お主の偉大な働きに感謝する、
相応しき喩えを探していたのだ…………。

source: TEXT_BANVAN008_02225_LINUVANU_000_011<tab>But moon sets and sun rises time and again, and still proper words do not come.
target: TEXT_BANVAN008_02225_LINUVANU_000_011<tab>しかし、なかなか見つからなかった……。

source: TEXT_BANVAN008_02225_LINUVANU_000_012<tab>However, now that <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> stands before me, it is clear!
target:
TEXT_BANVAN008_02225_LINUVANU_000_012それが、それが、
こうして、お主を前にして、今まさに浮かんだ！

source: TEXT_BANVAN008_02225_LINUVANU_000_013<tab>A netherling such as <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> is more precious than double─no, <var 1A 02 /var>triple<var 1A 01 /var>─rainbow stretching all the way across cloud sea!
target:
TEXT_BANVAN008_02225_LINUVANU_000_013我が「鮮やかなグンド」は、
)) (( )) 02 /var>の働きに、
雲海にかかる七色の虹のように、鮮やかに感謝する！

source: TEXT_BANVAN008_02225_LINUVANU_000_014<tab>From this day onward, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> will be welcome in Ok' Gundu Nakki as a most honored guest!
target:
TEXT_BANVAN008_02225_LINUVANU_000_014これからは、これからは、
お主を、我がグンド最上の客人「鮮やかな友」として迎えよう！

source: TEXT_BANVAN008_02225_SYSTEM_000_100<tab>You have achieved <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Bloodsworn<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> reputation with the Gundu.
target:
TEXT_BANVAN008_02225_SYSTEM_000_100「バヌバヌ族：鮮やかなグンド」との友好関係が、
「誓約★」になりました。
冒険者の働きによって、彼らと固い約束で結ばれたようです。

source: TEXT_BANVAN008_02225_SYSTEM_100_100<tab>You will receive an experience point bonus upon the completion of Vanu Vanu beast tribe daily quests.
target:
TEXT_BANVAN008_02225_SYSTEM_100_100これ以降、「バヌバヌ族：鮮やかなグンド」の、
「蛮族デイリークエスト」で獲得できる経験値に、
よりいっそうのボーナスが付加されます！
